#summary TextHTML, HTML support

= Valid HTML =

* <font ...>

  options:

  * size=...
    font size

  * color=#rrggbb 
    Hex (RGB) color

  * name=... 
    font name
  
* </font>

* <a ...>

  option:

  * href=...
    "link" or id returned when a link is clicked

* </a>

* <i> ... </i>

  Italic font

* <b> ... </b>

  Bold font

* <p align=...>

  options:

  * left
  * right
  * center
  * justify

* </p>

* <br>

* Special chars:

  &quot;  ---> "
  &nbsp;  ---> non-breaking space
  &lt;    ---> <
  &gt;    ---> >
  &euro;  ---> â‚¬
  &amp;   ---> &
